text: Thæcring sraththa chn thithæ cring nan khux brrda phu sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh læw phwk khea mi sngsay kheluxbkhælngcı tæ phwk khea di seiysla txsu dinrn dwy thraphysmbati khxng phwk khea læa chiwit khxng phwk khea pi nı hnthang khx ngxallxhˌ chn hela nan hæla khux brrda phu saty cring
